post:
So I have yet again some spare resources that I will be allocating to people on a first come first served basis.

I have to stress that this is strictly a Canada / US offer and I know you can use a VPN to lie about where you are, but trust me I'll know.

So here's the deal. Send me an email Andrew@WePwn.net with your resource requirements as well as the purpose for the resources you are requesting. I have several IPs available and the server is nowhere near capacity.

If you are a problem on the node, you will be removed quickly so don't try any illegal stuff. This server is based in the US so copyright law applies and I will not provide servers for Torrenting or file sharing. If I find you doing anything prohibited I will wipe your VM and will not offer a backup. Be warned.

If you've got this far and are a resident of Canada or the US please feel free to make a request.

I also have gitlab running and am happy to offer free repos to any developers who may need space or just a place to work.

Thanks,

Andrew
